title: Lunatic Fringe
description: New author Allison Moon indulges the feminine wild by giving the classic werewolf myth a feminist lesbian twist.Lexie Clarion's first night at college, she falls in with a pack of radical feminist werewolf hunters. The next morning, she falls for a mysterious woman who may be among the hunted. As Lexie's new lover and the Pack battle for Lexie's allegiance, the waxing moon illuminates old hatreds, new enemies, and a secret from Lexie's childhood that will change her life forever
author: Allison Moon
